trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"> </xref> händelsen för en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: Händelsemodell i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] baseras på med ett händelsedelegeringen som ansluter en händelse med dess hanterare.

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, two elements are needed: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: Så här höjer du en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>händelse krävs två element: – <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>klass som härletts från <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, som innehåller informationen om händelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: - The DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: -DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler-delegat som pekar på en metod som ger svar på händelsen.

trans-unit.source: When you create a DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
